name: 5. Worksheets

cf.path: Map Notes#/CF_SEP/PFRPG - Kingdom Building - GM Version

content:
These are worksheets for tracking the kingdom and settlements.
I've included two options; Journal Entry and NPCs. The NPC version has no functionality, just the information in the Bio, however, it allows Kingdoms and Settlements allow the Kingdom/Settlements to be placed on maps as tokens. 

Feel free to use whichever is most convenient for your group.

Journal Version

@Compendium[pf-content.kingdom-building-gm.LH23qbXxFPsijAOY]{Kingdom Sheet}

@Compendium[pf-content.kingdom-building-gm.YU7xlXVrPt5pDPUS]{District Sheet}

 

NPC Version
